name: Concerto
description: Ever wonder where music artists make all that sweet dough? This case studies explores the world of music concerts, the cost it takes to bring them to the people and the profit margins musicians see from it.
brief: Did you know that live performances make up 80% of an artist's income? Which is why many artists strive to give audiences the best concert experience possible.
sub_brief: I was particularly interested in analyzing special effects and scale of top grossing concerts. I wanted to solve the question: do these two features correlate with the revenue that artists gain from concerts? Concerto is a data visualization prototype that takes a look at the top 20 grossing concert tours of all time. We take a look at the "ingredients" of a tour and see what it takes to make a top grossing concert.
role: Concept, user experience, visual design and animation
data_visualization_text: It was a challenge to design for a data visualization which has many layers of information. I was able to solve this problem of layering through progressive disclosure, highlighted below:
deck_conclusion: Read about the process of this project in more detail.

data_visualizations.title: Special Effects & Tour Stats
data_visualizations.body: The concert tours are divided into two sections, where users can either view the data by special effects or by tour statitstics. Each concert tour is represented by a circle. The size of the circle correlates to the total gross of the concert.

data_visualizations.title: Filter
data_visualizations.body: Both the Special Effects page and Tour Statistics page have filters that allow the users to change the measurements shown on the y-axis.

data_visualizations.title: Hover States
data_visualizations.body: When a user hovers over a concert bubble, the bubble expands to display more information, including the name of the tour and the artists. Other the concert bubbles will minimize.

data_visualizations.title: Concerto Tour Map
data_visualizations.body: When a user clicks on a bubble, it will take them to a Concert Tour Map page. The map highlights the cities where a tour performed. The size of the rings are correlated to the attendance during the concert.

visual_design_text: In relation to the energy and iredescent quality of concerts, I wanted Concerto's visual design to be just as vibrant and colorful; paired with simple and clean typography.
